Name: Reptile
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 7 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Tardan 7 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 여름 작물. 성장하려면 7일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps. Prend 7 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesse el. 7 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso na primavera. Leva 7 dias para amadurecer.
